templates.subject: Submit Manage Membership form
templates.reply:
Happy to help!

Our Unlimited Wash Club is valid across all Rising Tide Car Wash locations. Addresses can be found on my signature line below. üí° Feel free to click the link above to learn more about this plan online.

To change the card on file OR if you need to cancel our membership, please submit a Manage Membership Form through our website & submit one form per car. This is an automated system & in most cases you can leave the 'Barcode from windshield if applicable' field blank.

If you need any additional assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to us via this designated email. Responses are requested within this same thread to minimize delays in processing. ‚ú®

templates.subject: 1st Month PROMO Cancellation
templates.reply:
Thank you for reaching out to our team. We're so sorry to hear about any confusion this may have caused. I'll do my best to provide some clarity within this thread & provide you with a resolution. It looks like you enrolled in our unlimited $XXmonthly club on ?????? at our XXX location for the vehicle with license plate # XXXXX during our promotional period, which is 1st month of the membership is the same price as 1 wash.

Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback, I'll be sharing these insights with the local team so that they can review & continue to improve. Rest assured that we strive for transparency & will be sure to follow up with our team so that we can do better in the future. I believe that part of the confusion may have been that the promotional pricing applies to the 1st month only after that period is over, customers who opt to keep their membership active will be charged the regular renewal rate of $$$$ a month.
  • A full description of this club offering & option to decline appears on the self-service touch screen. The pay station screens display the current promotional pricing, terms & conditions which can be accessed through our website, & if selected will prompt the driver for a phone number. This is a paperless enrollment process - the phone number allows the automated system to send a welcome text for further transparency about how this club & cancellation process works.


My sincere apologies for any confusion! Rest assured that memberships can be cancelled at any time. Please allow this email to serve as confirmation that your membership can be cancelled as requested, you will not be charged again, & this vehicle will be able to redeem unlimited washes at any Rising Tide until the close of business on ??????????.

If you need any additional assistance please do not hesitate to reach out to us via this designated email. Responses are requested within this same thread to minimize delays in processing. ‚ú®

templates.subject: 1st Month Promotion Refund Request
templates.reply:
Good afternoon,

I'll do my best to help & I believe that part of the confusion may have been that we are currently running a special at our locations where customers can sign up for a membership at the same cost of 1 wash (1st month for the price of 1 wash). This promotional pricing applies to the 1st month only(after that, customers who opt to keep their membership active would be charged the regular renewal rate of $XXXXa month):
  • A description of this club offering & alternative options appears on the sales presentation tablet our attendant holds:
  • A full description & decline appears on the self-service touch screen again at our pay stations:


The pay station screens display the current (promotional) pricing, terms & conditions which can also be accessed through our website, & if selected will prompt the driver for a phone number. This is a paperless enrollment process - the phone number allows the automated system to send a welcome tect for further transparency about how this club and cancellation works.

You enrolled on our Ripple Club on MM/DD/YY during the '1st month for the same price of 1 wash' promotion.
  • Please see attatched for the audio of your transaction during which time the attendant explains the renewal cost
  • As well as the welcome text(s) sent to the phone number on file XXX-XXX-XXXX, on MM/DD/YY that also outlined the renewal cost & cancellation policy


While I am unable to issue you a refund for the renewal that was charged on MM/DD our system will allow me to issue a courtesy Xmonth extension. Your account is currently paid through close of business on MM/DD/YY. If you would like to accept this extension please let me know & I will extend your membership expiration date to grant you the additional time & send you back a confirmation

I hope that you'll consider accepting this extension & come back to utilize your membership perks across all Rising Tide Car Wash locations. Looking forward to reconnecting.üòÅ

If you need any additional assistance please do not hesitate to reach out to us via this designated email. Responses are requested within this same thread to minimize delays in processing. ‚ú®

templates.subject: How to change CC - SUSPENDED membership
templates.reply:
Thank you for reaching out to our team. We'd be happy to help!

Currently, due to merchant privacy regulations at this time there are only two ways to update the card on file:

Option 1: The fastest way to reactivate a membership is by renewing on site, where the card is swiped in our point of sales system.
Option 2: Update the card via our website. Once this is done, please send us a follow-up email stating this action is complete so we can set the account to 'Bill' status. Keep in mind that our email is a communal inbox; therefore, expect responses in about 48‚Äì72 hours.

We have set the membership for your account, under license plate: ####, to 'suspend' so that our system will not attempt to automatically bill the card on file.

If doing option 1:
After ??? EXPIRATION DATE ???, when you visit your preferred location, this is the screen you will likely see:
Select 'Renew my membership' & swipe your new card when prompted


If you need any assistance during this visit, please feel free to ask for a Supervisor or Manager so that they can assist.

If you need any additional assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to us via this designated email. Responses are requested within this same thread to minimize delays in processing. ‚ú®

templates.subject: No Cancellation Form found - Refund Request
templates.reply:
Thank you for reaching out to our team. We're sorry to hear about any inconvenience that this may have caused. Please note that our process requires that all cancellation requests be submitted in writing either through this designated email address or via the Manage Membership form on our website as indicated on the screen during the initial enrollment & posted on our website.

I've reviewed this inbox & our Manage Membership dashboard but have no record of a written cancellation request prior to this email thread. However, I completely understand your frustration & will be sure to use this as a valuable training opportunity for our team on the importance of clearly redirecting customers back to our website for all cancellations.

I have issued a refund for your XXX payment as a courtesy exception & this profile has been terminated effective immediately. Depending on your banking institution these changes may take a few days to be reflected back on the account.

If you need any additional assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to us via this designated email. Responses are requested within this same thread to minimize delays in processing. ‚ú®

templates.subject: License Plate Not Found - Needed for Termination
templates.reply:
Thank you for reaching out to our team!

So sorry to see you go but I would be happy to assist you. Our memberships currently operate via License Plate Recognition. To cancel your membership, please submit a Manage Membership Cancellation form on our website, located in the signature of this email. This is the fastest way to make sure that your account is cancelled as it will prompt you to input the affiliated phone number & license plate.

  • You would then receive a confirmation response day-of & not lose any time that was previously purchased, i.e. if you paid on March 15th your membership would still be active through April 15th regardless of cancellation date.


Alternatively, this inbox is monitored various times a week Monday-Friday. If you prefer to reply back to this email thread with your license plate number/phone number I would be happy to look up your account for you, as I was unable to locate a membership with the information that was provided during an initial search.

If you need any additional assistance please do not hesitate to reach out to us via this designated email. Responses are requested within this same thread to minimize delays in processing. ‚ú®

templates.subject: License Plate Reader Issues
templates.reply:
I'm so very sorry to hear about the difficulty that you have been experiencing. I'll do my best to assist. Rest assured that we value our supporters & strive to provide a great customer experience which I can see we have fallen short of. We appreciate you taking the time to provide us with feedback so that we can continue to improve.

To provide some context, our vendor's License Plate Reader system is intended to automatically scan the license plate number at entry as it approaches the pay station. It then will search through our database to find a registered match & if that vehicle is affiliated with an active membership profile, it then provides the vehicle with their club's wash, if your're at our Parkland or Margate locations it will also have the option of adding on any of our interior membership upgrades from the menu at this time.

License plate recognition usually works best with standard issue state plates since non-standard characters, spacing, or alternative graphic backgrounds/borders may at times interfere with the accuracy of these reads. Typically, attendants are able to quickly assist customers with custom plates by being near the pay station & swiping our Management Card to look up the plate manually when needed.
  • I will be sharing your feedback with each site's management team so that we can use this as a valuable coaching opportunity regarding clear communication & having attendants nearby.
  • I would also like to take a look into your account to confirm that everything is registered correctly on our end. When you have a moment, please reply back with the:
    • Phone number affiliated with this membership
    • License plate number that should be on file


That will allow me to look into this further & submit a support ticket to our vendor so that we can try to exhaust all troubleshooting options. For all other questions or concerns please do not hesitate to reach out to me via this designated inbox

If you need any additional assistance please do not hesitate to reach out to us via this designated email. Responses are requested within this same thread to minimize delays in processing. ‚ú®

templates.subject: Activation Confirmation: 3 Month Membership

You're in the club! üéâ

Great news ‚Äî we received your request to activate a 3 Month Unlimited Exterior Membership GIFT:

  • This gifted membership will expire on MM/DD/YY (day before expiration) at close of business.


Your vehicle registration has been completed for the Tide Guard Club ‚Äî our top wash (Signature Ceramic Members are grandfathered in).

Visit our website to learn how this membership works, view FAQs including our Limited Liability Policy, and review our Terms & Conditions.

Our memberships use License Plate Recognition. Each time you visit a Rising Tide location, you‚Äôll receive the following:

Additional $13.08+tax upgrades:

When your gifted period ends, you‚Äôll have the option to renew at our current club rate ($42.95 + tax/month) as noted in the Terms & Conditions. Follow the pay station prompts:



By selecting 'Renew my membership':

A team member is usually nearby to assist!

templates.subject: FAQ: Interior Upgrade Includes
templates.reply:
Thank you for reaching out regarding our Ripple Club, feel free to visit our website for additional information.

Exterior Members have the option to purchase an Express Interior Cleaning upgrade at our Parkland or Margate stores, for $13 + tax. This includes our team:
  • Drying down your car
  • Using an air tool to blow the crevices clean
  • Vacuum
  • Any removable mats are cleaned
  • Wipe down of hard surfaces
  • Interior and exterior windows cleaned
  • Tire shine re-applied and rims touched up by hand
  • Exterior bug check, touched up by hand
  • Air freshener, by request


Alternatively, our self service vacuums are free across all 3 locations. Please note, Coral Springs is an exterior-only site üëç

Hope this helps!

If you need any additional assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to us via this designated email. Responses are requested within this same thread to minimize delays in processing. ‚ú®

templates.subject: Alternative Cost Saving Options

Thank you for your interest in our services! While our Unlimited Club may not be the right fit for you at this time, I'm happy to share some alternative cost-saving options in the hopes that you'll consider visiting us in the future:
  • Our 'BOGO 50% off' gift card promotion typically runs from the beginning of June through Father's Day. During the holidays, we often feature other seasonal offers‚Äîso be sure to stay tuned for updates!


If you need any additional assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to us via this designated email. Responses are requested within this same thread to minimize delays in processing. ‚ú®

templates.subject: FAQ: Interested in Mission
templates.reply:
Thank you for taking an interest in our social enterprise. We currently operate three locations in South Florida: Parkland, Margate, and Coral Springs.

For those looking to learn more about autism-focused entrepreneurship, we invite you to join our private Facebook group: Autism Entrepreneurship. It's a great space for aspiring founders interested in starting their own autism enterprise.

Additionally, we offer a web-based program through Rising Tide U, which shares insights from our journey. Some of the resources are free, while others may have a small fee‚Äîfeel free to explore what fits your needs.

If you need any additional assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to us via this designated email. Responses are requested within this same thread to minimize delays in processing. ‚ú®

templates.subject: Membership Pricing & Benefits
templates.reply:
Thanks for reaching out! We currently offer three levels of exterior memberships:

  • Tide Guard Club ‚Äì $42.95 + tax per vehicle/month
    • Our top-tier wash featuring Graphene + Ceramic Supershine to help protect your vehicle from chips, scratches, and UV damage
    • Rain Repellant
    • Rainbow Polish
    • Tire Shine & Wheel Cleaner
  • Tide Gloss Club ‚Äì $34.95 + tax per vehicle/month
    • Includes our Ceramic Supershine application (no Graphene)
    • Shine Bath & Shine Boost
    • Rain Repellant
    • Rainbow Polish
    • Tire Shine & Wheel Cleaner
  • Tide Glaze ‚Äì $29.90 + tax per vehicle/month
    • No Ceramic or Graphene
    • Carnauba Wax for standard protection
    • Rain Repellant
    • Rainbow Polish
    • Tire Shine & Wheel Cleaner

You can view full benefits and sign up here: Membership Plans

When you arrive at a location, our attendants near the pay station can help you select the best option for your needs.

We're currently running a promotion where new members can get their first month for the price of a single wash. After the first month, your plan will renew at the standard monthly rate.

To enroll, simply visit any Rising Tide Car Wash location with your vehicle.

If you need any additional assistance, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out to us via this designated email. Responses are requested within this same thread to minimize delays in processing. ‚ú®

templates.subject: Unable to Enroll in Retired Club
templates.reply:
We appreciate your interest! Currently, we are only accepting enrollees for the current clubs. For more information, check out our website where it explains the different options for our Ripple Club.

Rising Tide has continued to make improvements, elevating our top-tier washes & service offerings throughout the years. The current Unlimited Club allows members to receive an unlimited number of our current top three exterior washes. We also offer memberships with inside cleaning included ‚Äî for more information on those, please visit our Margate or Parkland locations. Addresses can be found under my signature.

Retired clubs are no longer open to new enrollees. These members may cancel their retired membership & enroll in the current club at the current rate any time they wish to upgrade.

Thank you for your understanding and support.

If you need any additional assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to us via this designated email. Responses are requested within this same thread to minimize delays in processing. ‚ú®
